overview_of_class: This course constitutes the first in a three part, year-long, introduction to the ancient Greek language, designed to provide students with the training required to begin reading unaltered ancient texts by the end of the year. Once this course is completed students will be able to progress to courses on such topics as the New Testament, Plato, Homer, the Greek tragedians, and many more. This first course, then, focuses on the most fundamental elements of Greek grammar and vocabulary.
name: Elementary Greek
subject: GREEK
